channel.title: Google Workspace Status Dashboard
channel.description: Updates on performance information for Google Workspace services from the Google Workspace Status Dashboard (http://www.google.com/appsstatus#hl=en). Unless otherwise noted, this status information applies to consumer services as well as services for organizations using Google Workspace.

item.title: Gmail
item.description:
January 20, 2021 4:30:00 AM PST

The problem with Gmail has been resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience and continued support. Please rest assured that system reliability is a top priority at Google, and we are making continuous improvements to make our systems better.

 January 20, 2021 4:14:00 AM PST

Gmail service has already been restored for some users, and we expect a resolution for all users in the near future. Please note this time frame is an estimate and may change.

 January 20, 2021 3:37:00 AM PST

We are continuing to investigate this issue. We will provide an update by January 20, 2021 4:37:00 AM PST detailing when we expect to resolve the problem.


Using 'Basic HTML' mode may allow access to Gmail for some affected users https://support.google.com/mail/answer/15049

 January 20, 2021 3:18:00 AM PST

We are continuing to investigate this issue. We will provide an update by January 20, 2021 4:21:00 AM PST detailing when we expect to resolve the problem.


Using 'Load Basic HTML' mode (accessible from the lower right whilst Gmail is in the process of loading) may allow access to Gmail for some affected users

 January 20, 2021 2:15:00 AM PST

We're investigating reports of an issue with Gmail. We will provide more information shortly. The affected users are unable to access Gmail.


This issue looks to be geographically limited right now, if this changes at any point we will update you.
